unnormalised: The buzz is all about the new appointments at IIT-D! Apparently, Dr. Meena Sharma is the new HOD of the Computer Science dept. Heard she's quite the rockstar, with a Ph.D. from MIT and a ton of publications.
normalised: The buzz is all about the new appointments at I-I-T-D! Apparently, Doctor Meena Sharma is the new H-O-D of the Computer Science department. Heard she's quite the rockstar, with a P-h-D from M-I-T and a ton of publications.

unnormalised: And get this, Prof. R. Kumar, who's been teaching there for like, forever, is finally getting his due – he's been promoted to Dean of Academics. About time, right? Everyone knows he's been the backbone of the engineering program.
normalised: And get this, Professor R. Kumar, who's been teaching there for like, forever, is finally getting his due – he's been promoted to Dean of Academics. About time, right? Everyone knows he's been the backbone of the engineering program.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the changes are meant to bring a fresh perspective and boost the institute's ranking. Let's see if these "Dr."s and "Prof."s can actually make a difference!
normalised: Word on the street is that the changes are meant to bring a fresh perspective and boost the institute's ranking. Let's see if these "Doctor"s and "Professor"s can actually make a difference!

unnormalised: Speaking of which, Mrs. Iyer, the head of admissions, is also stepping down after 20 yrs. Big changes happening, folks!
normalised: Speaking of which, Mistress Iyer, the head of admissions, is also stepping down after twenty years. Big changes happening, folks!
